mapper.select: select jNo, jTotPay, jDate, jCardOwner, jEmail, jPhoneNo, jCardNo, jValidDate, jCardCVC, jStreetAddr, jStreetNMG, jCity, jCountry, jState, jZipCode, jGuest, jIfCancel, mNo from jumun where mNo=#{mNo}
select jNo, jTotPay, jDate, jCardOwner, jEmail, jPhoneNo, jCardNo, jValidDate, jCardCVC, jStreetAddr, jStreetNMG, jCity, jCountry, jState, jZipCode, jGuest, jIfCancel, mNo from jumun where jNo=#{jNo}
select jNo from jumun where mNo = #{mNo} and jDate = (select max(jDate) from jumun where mNo = #{mNo})
mapper.insert: insert into jumun (jNo, jTotPay, jDate, jCardOwner, jEmail, jPhoneNo, jCardNo, jValidDate, jCardCVC, jStreetAddr, jStreetNMG, jCity, jCountry, jState, jZipCode, jGuest, jIfCancel, mNo) values (jumun_SEQ.nextval, #{jTotPay}, sysdate, #{jCardOwner}, #{jEmail}, #{jPhoneNo}, #{jCardNo}, #{jValidDate}, #{jCardCVC}, #{jStreetAddr}, #{jStreetNMG}, #{jCity}, #{jCountry}, #{jState}, #{jZipCode}, #{jGuest}, 1, #{mNo})

insert into jumun_detail (jdNo, jdOrderDate, jdCheckout, jdOrderTime, jdPickupPos, jdDropoffPos, jdProductQty, jdProductTot, jdOrderQty, jdStayDate, jNo, pNo) values (jumunDetail_SEQ.nextval, TO_DATE(#{jdOrderDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{jdCheckout, jdbcType=DATE}, #{jdOrderTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdPickupPos, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdDropoffPos, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdProductQty}, #{jdProductTot}, #{jdOrderQty}, #{jdStayDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jNo}, #{pNo})

select jd.jdNo, jd.jdOrderDate, jd.jdCheckout, jd.jdOrderTime, jd.jdPickupPos, jd.jdDropoffPos, jd.jdProductQty, jd.jdProductTot, jd.jdOrderQty, jd.jdStayDate, j.jNo, jd.pNo from jumun j inner join jumun_detail jd on j.jNo=jd.jNo and j.mNo=#{mNo}

mapper.delete: delete from jumun_detail where jNo=#{jNo} and mNo=#{mNo}
